info.name: Gul Og Gratis cleanup, edited to 2013 version
info.description:
Will remove unneeded blocks and make the site generally more useful (at least I think so...)
  * ads
  * large blocks of random ads
  * plays with some colors
  * huge footer and header areas gone
info.additionalInfo:
This is updated to match the recent 2013 version.

Redigeret og tilpasset det nye 2013 design...
